about_the_game:
Dive into the depths of the mind with "Thought Experiment Simulator," a groundbreaking game that brings famous philosophical thought experiments to life in a hilariously twisted adventure.
Explore the complexities of morality, consciousness, and reality as you step into the shoes of renowned philosophers.



Engage in simulations of well-known experiments like the trolley problem, infinite monkey, brain in a vat, and more, all while experiencing a comedic and darkly humorous take on these mind-bending scenarios.
With a creative approach to adapting thought experiments into gameplay, challenge your perspectives and question your own beliefs through the click of a mouse.



The game features a funny black-and-white art style that complements the absurdity of the experiments, offering a unique and entertaining journey through the realms of philosophical inquiry.
Are you ready to laugh, ponder, and click your way through the ultimate thought experiment experience?
